definition: Armenia, capital Yerevan 埃里溫|埃里温[Ai1 li3 wen1]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: National colours of Armenia, on the background of Mount Ararat.
sentences.chinese: 亞美尼亞民族色彩，在亞拉臘山的背景。

sentences.english: Of course, there was only one large and powerful nation close to Armenia.
sentences.chinese: 誰都知道亞美尼亞鄰近中只有一個強大有力的國家。

sentences.english: The aircraft was traveling from Tehran to the Armenian capital of Yerevan.
sentences.chinese: 該班機由伊朗首都德黑蘭飛往亞美尼亞首都埃裏溫。

sentences.english: Many Armenian troops from there earn their living as mercenaries fighting for anyone who can pay them.
sentences.chinese: 許多當地的亞美尼亞軍隊從事傭兵生涯爲金錢效命。

sentences.english: The Armenian dram has lost over a third of its value against the dollar.
sentences.chinese: 亞美尼亞德拉姆對美元的匯率已跌去三分之一強。

sentences.english: It did not win any medal in the 2004 Athens Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 亞美尼亞在2004年的雅典奧運會上沒有獲得獎牌。

sentences.english: Is Lydian making efforts to get the word out about their discovery in Armenia?
sentences.chinese: 呂底亞是努力讓他們在亞美尼亞發現了這個詞？

sentences.english: Armenia reiterates its wish to settle the Nagorno-Karabakh issue through peaceful negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 亞美尼亞重申通過和平談判解決納卡問題的願望。

sentences.english: The war has bled the once-strong Armenian economy dry.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭榨乾了原本繁榮的亞美尼亞經濟。

sentences.english: According to tradition, he was martyred in Armenia.
sentences.chinese: 按照傳統，他是烈屬，在亞美尼亞。

sentences.english: Armenia is a land-locked country located in Eurasia's Southern Caucasus mountain range.
sentences.chinese: 亞美尼亞是位於歐亞大陸南高加索山脈的內陸國。

sentences.english: The history between Turkey and Armenia is a series of awful events.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其和亞美尼亞在歷史上經歷了一連串慘痛事件。

sentences.english: I have two homelands and Armenia is the first one.
sentences.chinese: 我有兩個故鄉，而亞美尼亞是那第一個。

sentences.english: The predominant religion in Armenia is Christianity.
sentences.chinese: 亞美尼亞主要的宗教是基督教。

sentences.english: Right, Arjun and Lydian has made a major discovery in Armenia.
sentences.chinese: 是的，阿君和呂底亞已在亞美尼亞重大發現。

sentences.english: Another man has a more positive view.
sentences.chinese: 另一名男子對居爾訪問亞美尼亞的態度比較積極。

definition: East Timor (officially Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste)
Guatemala/see also 瓜地馬拉|瓜地马拉[Gua1 di4 ma3 la1]
Moldova/Republic of Moldova, former Soviet republic on the border with Romania

pinyin: Sha1 wu1 di4 A1 la1 bo2
